Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IClusterDefinition
    Exposes the definition of the HA cluster.
    IClusterState
    Instances of this interface have the ability to take snapshots of the current cluster state.
    IClusterStateSnapshot
    Instances of this interface represents snapshots of the cluster state and expose: Which node is the primary. Which nodes are secondary. Which remote nodes are visible.
    IDistributedGroupController
    Describes the functionality exposed by a group controller which wraps an IGroup in order to: Maintain and expose the current cluster state, act as a source of discrete group events, expose group-related actions.
    IHAContext
    Defines the functionality exposed by the HA context to the rest of the application: Method IHAContext.getClusterDefinition() provides access to the static definition of the cluster.
    IServiceConfigurationChangeListener
    Implementations of this interface can be informed when service configuration has been changed.
    IServiceConfigurationReplicationPrimarySideOperationHandlers
    Defines the operations secondary nodes make on the primary nodes to retrieve configuration data.
    IServiceWithReplicatedConfiguration
    An interface that must be implemented by any service that requires its configuration to be replicated across nodes in a cluster.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClusterCommandLineProcessor
    Command-line processor for HA-related commands.
    ClusterNode
    Instances of this class represent nodes in the HA cluster and are composed of: A name, corresponding to the value of attribute id of element ClusterNode in the HA configuration.
    ClusterPrimaryStatusEvent
    Event fired by the HA sub-system when the local cluster node's primary status changes.
    ClusterSite
    Instances of this class represent sites where cluster nodes are located and wrap: A site name.
    ConfigFileFragment
    Represents a configuration file fragment.
    DistributedConfigurationHandler
    Handles all the functionality related to distributing configuration in a cluster environment.
    DistributedConfigurationUtils
    Contains utility functions related to distributed configuration.
    HAContext
    This is the main entry point to the HA sub-system.
    HALoggerHelper
    Helper class that provides static methods and constants for initializing loggers in HA context.
    ReplicationFlagFileMonitor
    Read the service configuration flag and determine if there has been any changes, i.e.
    ServiceConfigurationChangedFlagHandler
    Provides an operation to update the local configuration changed flag.
    ServiceConfigurationFileReader
    The configuration for a service may span over a number of files.
    ServiceConfigurationFileWriter
    This class represents the secondary side of service configuration replication.
    ServiceConfigurationReader
    Manages all configuration files for a service.
    ServiceConfigurationReplicator
    Manages the service configuration replication at both the client and server side.
    ServiceConfigurationWriter
    The service configuration writer is responsible for requesting configuration from the primary and flushing out to disk when requested.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HALoggerHelper.LoggerCategory
    Enum that defines category for HA loggers
    ServiceConfigurationReplicationException.ErrorCode  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HAContextInitializationException
    Instances of this unchecked exception class are thrown to report errors during the initialization of the HA sub-system.
    ServiceConfigurationReplicationException
    Raised when errors occur in the service configuration replication system.
